item.title: 知识框架
item.description: Database sql基础知识 sql基础知识 sql笔试题 SQL面试必会50题 # 查询每门功成绩最好的前两名 SELECT c_id, max(case when rank1 = 1 then s_score else null end ) as '第一', max(case when rank1 = 2 then s_score else null end ) as '第二' FROM (SELECT score.s_id, student.s_name, score.c_id, score.s_score, row_number() over(partition by c_id order by s_score DESC) rank1 FROM score INNER JOIN student ON score.s_id = student.s_id) a WHERE rank1 in (1,2) Group by c_id; # 查询选修“张三”老师所授课程的学生中成绩最高的学生姓名及其成绩 select score.
